text: Between Rings: The Esther Phiri Story is a 2014 Zambian Finnish documentary co-directed by Jessie Chisi and Salla Sorri and is based on the story about Esther Phiri Zambia's first female boxing champion. ==Other websites== * Category:2014 documentary movies Category:Zambian movies Category:Finnish movies Category:Movies set in Zambia
title: Between Rings
